sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:393fbbfa4f223300c09fb8de9310c7ef</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CargarModificarServerSelectBOXbcr</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	//llamo el glideAjax
	
	 //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	//si elijo modificar primero cargo el selelectBox    puedo sar varias IP para seleccionar

	var tipoSolicitud = g_form.getValue('tipo_de_solicitud');
	var instanciaPrimaria = g_form.getValue('instancia_primaria_bcr');
	
	if(tipoSolicitud == 'Modificar Servers'){
		console.log("+++++++++++++++");
		console.log("CargarModificarServerSelectBOXbcr");
		//cargo los datos al box
		// setRead Only nombre serviceGrouyp
		var ga = new GlideAjax('MostrarServerBCR32');
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "listarserver32");
		 ga.addParam("sysparm_name_IP", instanciaPrimaria);
		ga.getXML(getResponse);
		
		alert("CargarModificarServerSelectBOXbcr");
	}else{
		//limpio campos nombre IP comments 
			g_form.setValue('nombre_del_server', '');
		g_form.setValue('ip_address', '');
		g_form.setValue('commentarios', '');
		
		
		
		
	}
	
	//function 
	
	// aqui carga por campos 
	function getResponse(response) {
		
		var values = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		var arrayValue = JSON.parse(values).server;
		
			for(var i = 0; i < arrayValue.length; i++ ){
			var dataBoxFill = arrayValue[i].name;
					var ip = arrayValue[i].ipv46;
			var infoData = dataBoxFill + " ( "+ip+ " ) ";
			g_form.addOption('servidor_a_habilitar',dataBoxFill,infoData);
		//	g_form.addOption('server_a_modificar',dataBoxFill,dataBoxFill);
//server_a_modificar
			
		}//fin for
		

	}
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-19 20:14:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9acf7c704ffe7300c09fb8de9310c73b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CargarModificarServerSelectBOXbcr</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9acf7c704ffe7300c09fb8de9310c73b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>114190586</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-10 22:26:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
